user_query: I am planning a party for my friend's birthday and I want to make delicious and healthy food. Can you provide me with the nutritional analysis for a recipe that includes chicken, vegetables, and quinoa? Additionally, could you recommend some email marketing services to help me send out invitations to all the guests?

TaskList.description: Gather a recipe that includes chicken, vegetables, and quinoa.
Perform nutritional analysis for the gathered recipe.
Research and recommend suitable email marketing services for sending invitations.
